title: Since towerplates are really all that matters now...
body:
Is it possible we could see an eventual meta shift into 2x support junglers. One clears top side, and supports top side.
The other clears bot side, and supports bot side.

So like, Taric blue side.
Leona red side.
Seems to me like a more efficient way to take top tower, while keeping bot tower secured.

replies.body:
2 supp wuld take away 1 damage dealer so no.

edit: my editor raised my attention that i cant fking read pls elaborate "2x support junglers"

2 supp or 2 jungler?

2 supp :        -1 damage dealer so no

2 jungler:      cant cs efficiently 1 of them would fall behind or had to leech a lane too much just better staying at bot than
Legit just have 3 kill lanes and a support / engage / tank jungler who clears a few camps and focuses on ganking â€¦ mix it up and have a second jungler who invades, etc..

well considering a normal team comp is typically 
top tank/brusier off tank
jungle damage dealer
mid carry
bot carry 
support either tank or utility/enchanter 

you really arent.

collect some friends to play with reliably . practice this strat . get good at it . change the meta forever .
go .
I think the "support" jungle role could be flexible and doesn't neccisarily have to be a support, but would still grab a Relic Shield if its a melee.

i have suggested for a long time to no fan fare that the meta could be shifted where go duo mid lane and solo lanes top/bot with a jungler

where you can have support from mid roam with jungler to objectives easier or rotate to side lanes for ganks easier considering the support was in mid. 
and team that gets mid 1st has more map/jungle control so having duo mid it allows for a different dynamic in game play. where you can have 3 vs 3 fights mid with jungler, roams from either solo lanes etc.
